Origins: Willard Wigan is a "micro-miniaturist," an artist known for creating some of the world's smallest sculptures. As he and his work are described on his web site:
Description: Willard Wigan works with materials such as toothpicks, sugar crystals, and grains of rice and sand, spending months meticulously carving his materials into micro-figures like the ones displayed above. The video clip linked below, from the 1993 film An Eye on X , shows Willard discussing his art as he begins work on a sculpture of Malcolm X. Additional information: An Eye on X Small Is Beautiful (BBC)
